detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

name: shine
trans: vi. 发光；反射光；照耀表现突出，出众

sentences.english: The sun was shining .
sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light

detailed_translations.chinese: 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计
detailed_translations.english: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

name: shipping
trans: n. 海运；运送；船舶，船舶吨数

sentences.english: The port is closed to all shipping.
sentences.chinese: 这个港口已经封港。

detailed_translations.chinese: [船] 船舶，船舶吨数；海运；运送
detailed_translations.english: ships considered as a group

name: shortage
trans: n. 不足; 缺少; 缺少量; 不足额

sentences.english: There is no heating available due to fuel shortages.
sentences.chinese: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of funds.
sentences.chinese: 不缺资金。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need

name: shuttle
trans: n. 梭子；穿梭；穿梭班机、公共汽车等；航天飞机
vt. 使穿梭般来回移动；短程穿梭般运送
时态:shuttled, shuttling, shuttles名 词:shuttler

sentences.english: He took the Washington - New York shuttle.
sentences.chinese: 他乘坐华盛顿－纽约的往返班机。

detailed_translations.english: to travel frequently between two places

detailed_translations.chinese: 短程穿梭运行的飞机；航天飞机；梭子
detailed_translations.english: a  space shuttle
to travel frequently between two places

name: significant
trans: adj. 重要的, 重大的, 可观的有意义的, 有用意的意味深长的副 词:significantly

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

name: simplify
trans: vt. 简化；使单纯；使简易
时态:simplified, simplifying, simplifies名 词:simplification

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

name: situation
trans: n. 形势；情况〈正〉职业，职位，工作位置，环境形容词:situational

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

name: slump
trans: vi. 大幅度下降, 暴跌沉重或突然地落下[倒下]
n. 萧条期〈美〉(个人、球队等的)低潮状态

sentences.english: Sales slumped by 20% last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年销售额骤减 20%。

sentences.english: The council's land is now worth much less than originally hoped because of a slump in property prices.
sentences.chinese: 由于地产价格的暴跌，委员会的土地目前大不如原来所希望的那么值钱了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下降，衰落；倒下；大幅度下降，暴跌
detailed_translations.english: to fall or lean against something because you are not strong enough to stand
Slump is also a noun

sentences.english: She loaded the new software .
sentences.chinese: 她给电脑装上新的软件。

sentences.english: a software company
sentences.chinese: 软件公司

detailed_translations.english: the sets of programs that tell a computer how to do a particular job

name: spacious
trans: adj. 宽敞的，广阔的；无边无际的副 词:spaciously

sentences.english: a spacious living area
sentences.chinese: 宽敞的居住空间

detailed_translations.english: a spacious house, room etc is large and has plenty of space to move around in

name: specialize
trans: vi. 专门从事；详细说明；特化
vt. 使专门化；使适应特殊情况；详细说明

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

name: specify
trans: vt. 指定；列举；详细说明；把…列入说明书
时态:specified, specifying, specifies名 词:specifier

sentences.english: Payments will be made for a specified number of months.
sentences.chinese: 款项将在规定的几个月内支付。

sentences.english: They specified a spacious entrance hall.
sentences.chinese: 他们明确要求门厅要宽敞。

detailed_translations.english: to state something in an exact and detailed way

name: stable
trans: adj. 稳定的；坚定的；牢固的
vt. 赶入马房比较级:stabler, stablest名 词:stableness

sentences.english: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
sentences.chinese: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

sentences.english: Children like a stable environment.
sentences.chinese: 儿童喜欢稳定的环境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳定的，不变的；沉稳的，持重的
detailed_translations.english: steady and not likely to move or change
a building where horses are kept

sentences.english: She sat there staring into space (= looking for a long time at nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那里，出神地凝视前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something or someone for a long time without moving your eyes, for example because you are surprised, angry, or bored

name: starter
trans: n. 赛跑、赛马等起跑线上的人(马, 汽车等)发令员起动装置

sentences.english: We had soup as a starter , followed by steak.
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一道菜是汤，接下来是牛排。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起动机；发令员；第一道菜；发射装置；发起者；参加比赛者，上场队员
detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food eaten at the start of a meal before the main part

name: steep
trans: adj. 陡峭的；夸大的；不合理的；急剧升降的
n. 浸渍；峭壁比较级:steeper, steepest副 词:steeply

sentences.english: The road became rocky and steep.
sentences.chinese: 路变得崎岖陡峭起来。

sentences.english: a steep climb to the top
sentences.chinese: 到山顶的一段陡坡

sentences.english: steep cuts in benefits
sentences.chinese: 救济金的大幅度削减

detailed_translations.english: a road, hill etc that is steep slopes at a high angle

name: strategic
trans: adj. 战略(上)的有战略意义的; 至关重要的副 词:strategically

sentences.english: UN forces made a strategic withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 联合国部队作了战略性撤退。

sentences.english: strategic planning meetings
sentences.chinese: 战略计划会议

sentences.english: a strategic decision to move production to Hungary
sentences.chinese: 把生产转至匈牙利的战略决定

detailed_translations.english: done as part of a plan, especially in a military, business, or political situation

name: strategy
trans: n. 战略学, 兵法战略, 策略策略, 计谋

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

detailed_translations.english: a planned series of actions for achieving something

name: streamline
trans: vt. 把…做成流线型简化使效率更高

sentences.english: efforts to streamline the production process
sentences.chinese: 简化生产过程的努力

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…做成流线型；使现代化；组织；使合理化；使简单化
detailed_translations.english: to make something such as a business, organization etc work more simply and effectively

name: studio
trans: n. 工作室；演播室；画室；电影制片厂

sentences.english: a recording studio in Nashville
sentences.chinese: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.english: a photographer’s studio
sentences.chinese: 摄影师的工作室

detailed_translations.english: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded

name: subscribe
trans: vt. & vi. 捐助签署，题词
vi. 订购，预订同意；赞同

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

name: subscription
trans: n. 捐助，订阅，签名捐款；订阅费

sentences.english: You may cancel your subscription at any time.
sentences.chinese: 你随时可以取消订阅。

sentences.english: I’ve decided not to renew my subscription .
sentences.chinese: 我决定不再续订了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money you pay, usually once a year, to receive copies of a newspaper or magazine, or receive a service, or the act of paying money for this

name: suggest
trans: vt. 提议，建议；启发；使人想起

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

name: suggestion
trans: n. 建议, 意见细微的迹象

sentences.english: Any suggestions would be welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何建议都欢迎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建议， 意见； 细微的迹象； 暗示
detailed_translations.english: an idea, plan, or possibility that someone mentions, or the act of mentioning it

name: suit
trans: n. 一套衣服诉讼案件；法律程序
vt. & vi. 对…方便，使满意

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled

sentences.english: This inner scorecard is something that people use to rate the suitability of mates.
sentences.chinese: 这个内部记分卡是人们用于评价配偶适合度的依据。

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something or someone has the right qualities for a particular purpose

name: suitable
trans: adj. 适当的；相配的副 词:suitably

sentences.english: We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

detailed_translations.english: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

name: supervise
trans: vt. & vi. 监督, 管理

sentences.english: Griffiths closely supervised the research.
sentences.chinese: 格里菲思密切指导该项研究。

detailed_translations.english: to be in charge of an activity or person, and make sure that things are done in the correct way

sentences.english: The baby needs constant supervision.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝时刻都要有人照看。

detailed_translations.english: when you supervise someone or something

name: supplier
trans: n. 供应者；供应厂商，供应国

sentences.english: ...one of the country's biggest food suppliers.
sentences.chinese: …该国最大的食品供应商之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 供应厂商，供应国；供应者
detailed_translations.english: a company or person that provides a particular product

name: support
trans: vt. 支撑；撑扶；托住；支持维持赞助；赞成；供养经常光顾；为…捧场忍受
n. 支撑，承受，支持，赞助支撑物，支柱，支座，支架给予帮助[同情]的人支持者，拥护者

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you agree with an idea, group, or person, and usually to help them because you want them to succeed

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

sentences.english: Manchester United supporters
sentences.chinese: 曼彻斯特联队的支持者

detailed_translations.english: someone who supports a particular person, group, or plan

sentences.english: Troops sealed off the surrounding area .
sentences.chinese: 军队封锁了周围地区。

sentences.english: We decided to explore the surrounding countryside .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定去附近的乡间走走看看。

detailed_translations.english: near or around a particular place

name: suspicious
trans: adj. 猜疑的, 疑心的可疑的表示怀疑的副 词:suspiciously

sentences.english: His reluctance to answer my questions made me suspicious .
sentences.chinese: 他不愿回答我的问题，这引起我的怀疑。

sentences.english: She gave him a suspicious glance.
sentences.chinese: 她向他投去怀疑的一瞥。

sentences.english: You’ve got a very suspicious mind!
sentences.chinese: 你真是疑心太重！

detailed_translations.english: thinking that someone might be guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest

name: switchboard
trans: n. 电话总机, 电话交换台

sentences.english: switchboard operators
sentences.chinese: 电话总机接线员

sentences.english: Hundreds of callers jammed the switchboard trying to win the tickets (= there were too many calls for the switchboard to deal with ) .
sentences.chinese: 几百个电话打进来想赢取门票，总机应接不暇。

detailed_translations.english: a system used to connect telephone calls in an office building, hotel etc, or the people who operate the system

name: systematic
trans: adj. 有系统的; 有规则的; 彻底的副 词:systematically

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

name: takeover
trans: n. 收购；接收；接管强行接管，控制形容词:takeover

sentences.english: Thornbury has announced a takeover bid of a regional TV company.
sentences.chinese: 索恩伯里已经宣布将出价收购一家地方电视公司。

sentences.english: He prevented a hostile takeover (= when the takeover is not wanted by the company being bought ) of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他阻止了对公司的恶意收购。

detailed_translations.english: when one company takes control of another by buying more than half its  shares

name: target
trans: vt. 把……作为目标；规定……的指标；瞄准某物

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area

name: tax
trans: 时态:taxed, taxing, taxes名 词:taxer

sentences.english: No-one enjoys paying tax.
sentences.chinese: 没人喜欢缴税。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you must pay to the government according to your income, property, goods etc and that is used to pay for public services

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…征税； 使负担重， 使费尽力气
detailed_translations.english: to charge a tax on something

name: technical
trans: adj. 技术的；应用科学的艺术的，工艺的(指书等)要求有专门知识的，使用术语的，专业的副 词:technically

sentences.english: Our staff will be available to give you technical support .
sentences.chinese: 有我们的员工向你提供技术支持。

sentences.english: I have no technical knowledge at all.
sentences.chinese: 我一点技术知识都没有。

sentences.english: technical training
sentences.chinese: 技术培训

detailed_translations.english: connected with knowledge of how machines work

name: technician
trans: n. 技术人员，专家；技巧好的人

sentences.english: a laboratory technician
sentences.chinese: 实验室技术人员

sentences.english: a hospital technician
sentences.chinese: 医院技术人员

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to check equipment or machines and make sure that they are working properly

name: terminate
trans: v. （使）停止，结束，终止（公共汽车或火车) 到达终点站

sentences.english: The court ruled that the contract must be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 法庭裁决该合同必须终止。

sentences.english: to terminate a pregnancy (= to perform or have an abortion )
sentences.chinese: 终止妊娠（堕胎）

detailed_translations.english: ito end; to make sth end

name: terrible
trans: adj. 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的ad

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

name: terrific
trans: adj. 极大的, 非常的极好的，了不起的, 非常棒的, 非常漂亮的可怕的, 恐怖的, 骇人的副 词:terrifically

sentences.english: That’s a terrific idea!
sentences.chinese: 这个主意真棒！

sentences.english: The actress who played the lawyer was terrific.
sentences.chinese: 扮演律师的女演员表演十分出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极妙的； 极大的； 令人恐惧的
detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in a way that makes you feel happy and excited

name: theoretical
trans: adj. 理论的推想的, 假设的副 词:theoretically

sentences.english: These findings have both theoretical and practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.english: In this process, an interaction of theoretical study with practical work . should be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.english: Researchers have tossed around theoretical calculations of using just aluminum and water for rocket propellant in the past.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在过去辗转不安的进行理论计算，仅仅只用铝和水作为火箭燃料。

name: theory
trans: n. 理论；原理；学说；推测

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: thorough
trans: adj. 彻底的；十分的；周密的副 词:thoroughly

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.english: The police investigation was very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

sentences.english: The police are waging war on drug pushers in the city.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在市内开展一场打击毒贩的斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in a war against someone, or a fight against something

sentences.english: The airport hotel will be linked to the terminal building by a covered walkway.
sentences.chinese: 机场酒店将由一条有顶通道和航站楼相连。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor path built for people to walk along, often above the ground

name: warn
trans: vt. & vi. 警告，提醒；告诫；预先通知，预告

sentences.english: ‘Be careful, the rocks are slippery,’ Alex warned.
sentences.chinese: “小心，岩石很滑。”亚历克斯提醒说。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something bad or dangerous may happen, so that they can avoid it or prevent it

name: warning
trans: n. 发出警告;受到告诫可引以为戒的事(或人)征候;前兆(解雇、辞职等的)预先通知
adj. 警告的;告诫的;引为戒的

sentences.english: a warning that grey squirrels are threatening the existence of red squirrels
sentences.chinese: 关于灰松鼠正威胁到红松鼠生存的警告

detailed_translations.english: something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it

name: warrant
trans: vt. 使…显得合理；成为…的根据保证，担保

sentences.english: Therefore, it is important to note that individual situations may warrant including additional characters in the list of special characters.
sentences.chinese: 因此，要注意可能保证把额外字符包括到特殊字符列表中的个别情况，这一点很重要。

sentences.english: Learning incessantly is the surest way to keep pace with the times in the information age and an infallible warrant of success in times of uncertainty.
sentences.chinese: 持续的学习是在资讯时代中跟时代并驾齐驱的最稳当的方法，也是在变动的世代中成功的可靠保证。

sentences.english: At Dean Miller's suggestion, I have allowed her to give the current student organizers the opportunity to propose a program for next semester that might warrant continuation of this event on campus.
sentences.chinese: 根据米勒学监的建议，我允许她给学生机会，让他们给下学期的活动提出一个方案，保证这个活动得以在校园内继续开展。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that something is true

detailed_translations.chinese: 正当理由；许可证，委任状
detailed_translations.english: a legal document that is signed by a judge, allowing the police to take a particular action

sentences.english: The system used to result in a great deal of food wastage.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法过去造成了大量的食物浪费。

detailed_translations.english: when something is lost or destroyed, especially in a way that is not useful or reasonable, or the amount that is lost or destroyed

sentences.english: a waterproof jacket
sentences.chinese: 防水上衣

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.english: Rub the wax in to make the shoe waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing water to enter
a jacket or coat that does not allow rain and water through it

sentences.english: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.chinese: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

detailed_translations.chinese: 财富； 财产； 丰富
detailed_translations.english: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns

name: website
trans: n. 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）
detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

name: weight
trans: n. 重量，重力；砝码；重要性；负担

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

name: welfare
trans: n. 福利；福利事业；幸福；安宁
adj. 福利的；接受社会救济的

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

name: win
trans: vt. & vi. (在…中)获胜, 赢, 战胜(对手)
vt. 获得…(通过努力等)赢得, 博得, 获得
n. (体育比赛中)胜利, 赢WINWhip Inflation Now 立即制止通货膨胀运动〈美〉

sentences.english: Who’s winning (= who is most successful at this point in the game )?
sentences.chinese: 现在谁领先？

detailed_translations.english: to be the best or most successful in a competition, game, election etc
a success or victory, especially in sport

name: withdraw
trans: vt. & vi. 取[收]回(使)撤退[出]
时态:withdrew withdrawn withdrawing, withdraws形容词:withdrawable

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

name: withdrawal
trans: n. 收回，取回，撤回；撤退，撤走收回[取回，撤回；撤退，撤走]的实例

sentences.english: large-scale troop withdrawals
sentences.chinese: 大规模撤军

detailed_translations.chinese: 撤退，收回；提款；取消；退股
detailed_translations.english: the act of moving an army, weapons etc away from the area where they were fighting

name: workplace
trans: n. 工作场所; 工厂; 车间

sentences.english: ...the difficulties facing women in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: …妇女在工作场所中面临的困难。

detailed_translations.english: the room, building etc where you work

name: workshop
trans: n. 工场；车间；讲习班；研讨会Workshop玉夫星座

sentences.english: a modestly equipped workshop.
sentences.chinese: 一个装备普通的车间。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

name: worthless
trans: adj. 无价值的, 没有用处的名 词:worthlessness

sentences.english: The house was full of worthless junk.
sentences.chinese: 这房子里堆满了没有用的东西。

sentences.english: The information was worthless to me.
sentences.chinese: 这些资料对我毫无用处。

detailed_translations.english: something that is worthless has no value, importance, or use

name: wrap
trans: vi. 缠绕；穿外衣；包起来
n. 外套；围巾WRAPabbr. Web-Ready Appliances Protocol可上网家电协议

sentences.english: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.
sentences.chinese: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

name: X
trans: adj. X形的,X级的(电影等),第二十四的Xabbr. Xs或 X's X级电影，成人电影（十八岁以下儿童不得观看）

name: X-ray
trans: n. X射线, X光X光检查X光片
vt. & vi. 用X光摄影[检查, 治疗]

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays

sentences.english: Salary levels are reviewed on a yearly basis.
sentences.chinese: 工资水平每年都要审查。

sentences.english: a total yearly income of $78,000
sentences.chinese: 7.8万美元的年总收入

sentences.english: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.chinese: 客户们通常提前付费，或按月，或按季度，或按年。

detailed_translations.english: happening or appearing every year or once a year
Yearly is also an adverb

name: youth
trans: n. 青年时期, 青春(期)青春, 活力, 朝气, 血气青年人年轻人, 青年男子

sentences.english: Despite his youth, he had travelled alone.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然年纪还小，却已独自旅行过了。

sentences.english: The youth of today are the pensioners of tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天的年轻人就是明天领养老金的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being young

name: zero
trans: n. (数字)零零点，零位；零度没有，无
vi. 把(枪等)直接瞄准[聚焦]…

sentences.english: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
sentences.chinese: 设x大于或等于零。

detailed_translations.english: the number 0
the number 0

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way
